name: CHROMA (itch) (lyzastevens)
description:
STILL IN PROGRESS

Fallen into a world void of color, you must obtain the 3 missing chroma crystals and revitalize the environment around you.

Travel through harrowing platformer levels and find the last remaining shades of red, green, and blue.  Beware the enemies guarding your precious chroma crystals,  they won’t let you complete your journey so easily!

Credits

Lyza Stevens (@lyzastevens) - art, UI, & level design
